data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Hải Phòng to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hải Phòng, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 41,640 believers in Hải Phòng to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Hải Phòng.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Hải Phòng, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Hải Phòng access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Hải Phòng, Vietnam by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Hải Phòng, Vietnam has a population of 1,925,200.

We estimate Hải Phòng has 41,640 people who might know Jesus, 154,425 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,729,135 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Hải Phòng, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Hải Phòng
location.cities_list: Haiphong, Cát Bà, An Dương, An Lão, Tiên Lãng
location.cities_list_w_pop: Haiphong (841,520), Cát Bà (30,000), An Dương, An Lão, Tiên Lãng
